titleStmt.title: A second sermon vpon the ix. chapter of the holy gospel of Iesus Christ according to Saint Iohn Preached at S. Maries in Oxford, the 11. of December. 1586. By Iohn Chardon Doctor of Diuinity. Seene perused and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Chardon, John, d. 1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Windet for Tobie Cooke,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached in Oxford.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
